page.title: 10HIGHLAND HEALTH MATTERS
page.content: We are fairly well seved here for Health care. We have a general practitioner in Assynt. He has a panel of 840. The surgery is quite well equipped with a new electro-cardiac machine partly bought by public subscription. It is felt that there should be another Doctor. Distance to travel is not taken into account by the authorities- only numbers! The surgery doubles as a Dentists Surgery. Equipment for this was donated. We also have itinerent specialists visit us. The nearest major Hospital is in Inverness.(100mls). We also have a splended new Sheltered Housing complex here. Built in 1984 to cater for our elderly, we consider ourselves lucky to have it. There is also a District Nurse resident here plus a full time Ambulance Driver. The poor doctor also doubles as the Chemist!
